### Invitation to Tender for Pilot-Scale, Explosion-Proof Reverse Osmosis System
#### Reference Number: WS4104576231
#### Status: Expired

The [Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/index-eng.html) invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the supply of one pilot-scale, explosion-proof reverse osmosis (RO) system. 

The system will be used by [Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)](https://www.nrcan.gc.ca/home-eng.html) and must be delivered to Ottawa, ON on or before March 31, 2024. 

Key features of the requirement include:

* Pilot-scale, explosion-proof RO system
* Delivery to Ottawa, ON on or before March 31, 2024
* Meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Period of the Contract is from the date of Contract award to one year after delivery and acceptance, inclusive

Canada has the option to extend the term of the Contract by up to three additional one-year periods under the same terms and conditions.

### Proposal Submission Guidelines

Proposals must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery. The proposal submission deadline is October 30, 2023, at 14:00 HAE (2:00 PM EDT). Late submissions will be deemed non-responsive.
